===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# {{&lit|不|會|lang=zh}}
# be unlikely; will not
#: {{zh-x|人 '''不會''' 多 的。|There '''won't be''' too many people.}}
# have not learned to; be unable to
#: {{zh-x|我 '''不會''' 游泳。|I '''don't know how''' to swim.}}
# (used to express reproach for nonperformance of an action)
#: {{zh-x|'''不會''' 早點兒{r} 告訴 我 嗎！|'''You should have''' told me earlier!}}
